recipes.title: Imagination's Flight
recipes.description: Let your mind soar beyond the skies, harnessing the power of dreams to reach the sun.

recipes.title: Beam of Light
recipes.description: Travel on a sunbeam, riding the golden rays directly to the heart of the sun.

recipes.title: Solar Whisper
recipes.description: Listen to the whispers of the sun and let its secret path guide you.

recipes.title: Starlit Path
recipes.description: Follow the starlit path that leads to the sun, illuminated by the twinkle of distant stars.

recipes.title: Wings of Icarus
recipes.description: Craft wings of wax and feathers, embracing the daring spirit of Icarus.

recipes.title: Golden Chariot
recipes.description: Ride the golden chariot of Apollo, pulled by flaming horses across the sky.

recipes.title: Dreamer's Journey
recipes.description: Embark on a dreamer's journey, where reality bends and the sun awaits at the horizon.

recipes.title: Aurora's Embrace
recipes.description: Let the gentle embrace of Aurora Borealis carry you to the sun's warm glow.

recipes.title: Celestial Bridge
recipes.description: Walk the celestial bridge, a radiant arc that spans the heavens to the sun.
